name: summary-care-record
description: OAS (Swagger v3) API Definition for Template API

scripts.publish: ./node_modules/.bin/openapi-generator-cli generate -i specification/summary-care-record.yaml --generator-key v3.0 -g openapi -o build && rm openapitools.json && mv build/openapi.json build/summary-care-record.json

author: NHS Digital
